review_data.title: Localino molto grazioso, ottimo cibo.

review_data.title: Amazing!
review_data.content: I am a local in Zurich and I am enjoying that food since 5 years. Best sandwiches in Zurich! Fresh ingredients and very friendly service! I highly recommend! Compared to other take aways the price is definitely alright!

review_data.title: Sicily at it‘s best
review_data.content: BEST PANINI IN TOWN!!!! You will also find italian products and it‘s really good and cheap. You need to try the piadina😍

review_data.title: Best Panini in Town!
review_data.content: It’s a small Italian shop. They do serve fresh homemade Panini. Definitely the best sandwiches you can get. They do serve minimum 10 different kind of Panini. Very friendly staff, and normal prices. During lunchtime the shop is crowded. So better come early to get...More
